sentence.text: In humans, sensory perception of sound mutations cause autosomal recessive nonsyndromic deafness (DFNB79) by an unknown mechanism.
We observed significant hearing loss and progressive degeneration of stereocilia in the outer hair cells of sensory perception of sound-null mice starting from postnatal day 30.
The generated sensory perception of sound-null mice are ideal models of human hereditary deafness DFNB79
